Mayas_1.Name: Nascimento de Sangue (K'i'ik' Sijil)
Mayas_1.Description: Defend the village from invaders while the inhabitants prepare for farming. Build defenses and organize the warriors.

Mayas_2.Name: Montain Temple (Witz Nah)
Mayas_2.Description: Explore the dense forest, facing creatures and rival tribes seeking the same sacred resources.

Mayas_3.Name: Passaro vermelho (Chi’ik Tz'ik’in)
Mayas_3.Description: Navigate the rivers while facing pirates and protecting trade routes. Gather resources to keep your civilization thriving.

Mayas_4.Name: Cervo Selvagem (Tz’ul T’ul)
Mayas_4.Description: Face enemies that dominate the mountains and uncover ancestral relics. Use the terrain to your advantage in ambushes.

Mayas_5.Name: Senhor Cão (Ajawil Tz’i)
Mayas_5.Description: Defend the temple from invaders seeking to steal sacred knowledge. Engage in tactical battles to protect the site.

Mayas_6.Name: Dentes de Sangue (K’i’ik’ Nib’)
Mayas_6.Description: Confront rivals on a path filled with traps. Train your warriors and prepare for decisive battles.

Mayas_7.Name: Sacrificio de Sangue (Nahbal K’i’ik’)
Mayas_7.Description: Engage in a grand battle at a sacred site, where the gods watch. Win to gain blessings and special resources.
